regulations.title: Hotel/Apartment Regulations
regulations.content1: ✅ Please provide a photo of your ID card before checking in. For foreigners, please provide a photo of your Passport and valid Visa/Residence Permit.
regulations.content2: ✅ Clean up the apartment after organizing meals, hot pot, barbecue, etc. If not cleaned, a hygiene fee of 200,000 VND to 500,000 VND will be charged (depending on the level of cleanliness).
regulations.content3: ✅ Follow the regulations of the Apartment Complex and adhere to the laws of Vietnam, taking responsibility for your actions.
regulations.content4: ❌ Do not exceed the specified number of occupants: Studios and 1-bedroom units accommodate a maximum of 2 adults, 2-bedroom units accommodate a maximum of 4 adults, and 3-bedroom units accommodate a maximum of 6 adults. We reserve the right to refuse check-in and will not refund if you exceed the specified number of occupants.
regulations.content5: ❌ Do not use or store prohibited substances in any form. Do not organize gambling in the apartment. If you violate these rules, we will not refund the deposit.
regulations.content6: ❌ Do not take apartment items outside for personal use. Do not rearrange furniture such as sofas and dining tables. If violated, we will charge a rearrangement fee based on the actual situation.
regulations.content7: ❌ Do not use spare blankets, sheets, and towels stored in the emergency cabinet. If used, a laundry fee of 200,000 VND will be charged.
regulations.content8: ❌ Keep quiet between 22:00 and 8:00 the next morning to avoid disturbing other apartments.

policy.title: Room Reservation Policy
policy.content1: - If the guest cancels the room: The booking amount will not be refunded.
policy.content2: - Guests can reserve or change dates 48 hours (02 days) before check-in date. Reservations do not apply to groups of 3 minutes or more.
policy.content3: - For groups: No cancellation (at least 50% deposit)
policy.content4: - Reservation period is 1 month from the scheduled check-in date, reserve or change date maximum 01 time.

thank: Thank you for using our service!
